citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
11:25am-12:10pm on 16-OCT-18.
Inspector arrived to a locked gate, inspector called out for licensee, honked GOV horn and called the listed number,
left messages both voice and text. Inspector received text message at approximately 12:10 pm, licensee would not
be available today.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
11:25am-12:10pm on 16-OCT-18.
Inspector arrived to a locked gate, inspector called out for licensee, honked GOV horn  and called the listed number,
left messages both voice and text.  Inspector received text message at approximately 12:10 pm, licensee would not
be available today.
